articles.description: Arsenal's season started with a whimper and ended with one too. Monday night's chastening defeat at St James' Park will sting for the team, with their top four hopes now hanging by a thread.
articles.content: Arsenal's season started with a whimper and ended with one too. Monday night's chastening defeat at St James' Park will sting for the team, who know Champions League football was within their grasp a… [+12850 chars]

articles.author: Callum Rice-Coates
articles.title: An ode to Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, football's best owners - Planet Football
articles.description: Hollywood actors Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney have ignored the sceptics and Wrexham have become the envy of clubs across the country. It's hard to find owners as popular as these two.
articles.content:
“It’s the question we’ve gotten more than any other,” read the letter to supporters in the local newspaper.
“Why Wrexham? Because you deserve it.
“For 158 years of fearless devotion.
“For building… [+4399 chars]
